content.rendered:
Explore the Future of the Event Industry

Uncover Opportunities to Foster Creativity, Ignite Excellence. & Create Lasting Impact

The region’s biggest event of the year promises innovative and industry-changing ideas.

With a fresh approach, the event will be graced by more than 2500 professionals. It will feature free-to-attend seminars led by industry experts, providing abundant opportunities for professionals to uncover potential growth, collaborate with experts, and expand their knowledge.


The Middle East Event Show is brought to you by the following Sponsor companies and Exhibitors who have demonstrated an unwavering commitment to making this event possible.


SPONSORS:

 

Headline Sponsor – SLS Production

SLS Production specializes in audio, visual, and multimedia productions for events. The company has been at the forefront of creating flawless event experiences through its innovative solutions.
Platinum Sponsor – ADNEC Services

ADNEC is a brand and event agency boasting a formidable record of bringing brands to life. The company specializes in designing strategies and executing them flawlessly.
Award Co-sponsor – Event Lab

Event Lab is the resourcing partner for event agencies in the GCC region. The company offers experienced in-house resources to support the execution of flawless events.
Award Co-sponsor – GES

GES is a trade show execution company boasting a vast experience spanning over 90 years in planning, designing, and production.
Award Co-sponsor – Media Pro

Media Pro is a Dubai-based event production company that has serving the industry for more than 10 years by executing over 500 outstanding events.
Award Co-sponsor – MOTUS

MOTUS is a transport management solution provider. The company has a proven track record of designing and delivering transport solutions for events and exhibitions.
Award Co-sponsor – CSM Live

CMS offers wayfinding and signage solutions for a range of events across multiple industries. The company also specialises in fulfilling look and feel requirements for events through its studio, print, and production facilities.
Awards Category Sponsor – ESMOS

ESMOS serves as a recruitment specialist for the event industry across the UK and UAE. The company specialises in offering highly-targeted consultancy services for hosting successful events.
Awards Category Sponsor – Build Up

Build Up is a branding company that fosters concepts, creates stories, and converts designs into reality. It offers specialised services tailored to every company’s individual needs.
Awards Category Sponsor – Simple Solutions

Simple Solutions is an events and exhibition fit-out company known to offer exceptional services by delivering out-of-the-box solutions for every occasion and event.
Awards Category Sponsor – BE

BE is a full-service event design, management, and production company that specialises in following a strategic approach to bring life to events.
Awards Category Sponsor – Eventagrate

Eventagrate is an event technology agency specialising in handling creative and technological aspects of hosting an event, including 3D stage content design, live event streaming, and immersive metaverse spaces.
Awards Category Sponsor – George P. Johnson

George P. Johnson is a strategic experiential marketing agency with a global presence. The company specialises in event and brand marketing.
Lanyard Sponsor (CATEGORY SPONSOR) – Xenial Events

Xenial Events is a staffing company with a goal to simplify and automate the staffing process for events of all sizes across industries. It also extends admin and technical support.
Connect Cafe Sponsor (CATEGORY SPONSOR) – THA

THA serves as a staffing partner for luxury retail establishments, hospitality outlets, and the event sector globally. It offers temporary and permanent staffing solutions to companies across different industries.
Visitor Badge Sponsor (CATEGORY SPONSOR) – Build Up

Build Up is a branding company that fosters concepts creates stories, and converts designs into reality. It offers specialised services tailored to every company’s individual needs.


EXHIBITORS:

 

Exhibitor – Airjoy Entertainment

Airjoy Entertainment is an event planning company with years of experience in planning and hosting events of all sizes and scales successfully.
Exhibitor – ARC Series Production

ARC is a globally renowned company with the world’s largest glass-production plant and production sites in the UAE, USA, and China.
Exhibitor – Aviss

AVISS is an audio-visual company based in Dubai. The company specialises in providing AV security solutions, featuring an extensive portfolio of high-end and innovative products.
Exhibitor – Build Up

Build Up is a branding company that fosters concepts, creates stories, and converts designs into reality. It offers specialised services tailored to every company’s individual needs.
Exhibitor – Creative Factory

Creative Factory is an award-winning visual content studio that offers innovative solutions for live, virtual, and on-ground events.
Exhibitor – Crystal Arc

Crystal Arc is a leading manufacturer of bespoke awards, medals, trophies, plaques, and décor in the Middle East region. The company has carved a reputation for offering unique products to diverse clients across various industries.
Exhibitor – Code Brew

Code Brew is a mobile app development company based in Dubai. With over 12 years of experience, the company promises a 100% success rate in mobile app development.
Exhibitor – C vent

C vent offers event management solutions, ably supported by advanced technology. The company specialises in planning, marketing, and executing events, irrespective of their scale.
Exhibitor – Dream Master

Dream Master is an international entertainment company that brings imagination to life with on-site live musicians and dancers services.
Exhibitor- Dan Bolton Agency

Dan Bolton Agency offers talent management and event planning solutions for events. The company offers a range of services including artist management, creative performance & show design, and casting services.
Exhibitor – DXB Live

DXB Live is an event service provider company in Dubai with 18 years of industry experience. The company has planned and executed successful events for a range of organisations across multiple industries.
Exhibitor – Evento

Evento is a Dubai-based organisation that offers innovative and customised tech solutions to companies serving in different sectors. It specialises in mobile app development, chatbot solutions, AI, and website development, among other services.
Exhibitor – Ecoloo

Ecoloo offers environmentally-sustainable solutions in the form of VIP mobile ablutions, reduced mobility toilets, and budget portable toilets for events, private rental markets, and construction sites.
Exhibitor – Electra

Electra is a full-service project management company that also offers fully-integrated technical solutions with a vast experience spanning over three decades.
Exhibitor – Event Lab

Event Lab is the resourcing partner for event agencies in the GCC region. The company offers experienced in-house resources to support the execution of flawless events.
Exhibitor – Evalato

Evalato is an awards management software that streamlines the process of picking the worthiest winners. It helps collect applications and empowers judging through its powerful, feature-rich platform.
Exhibitor – Eventify

Eventify offers end-to-end event management solutions for virtual B2B and in-person events and conferences. Services include registration and ticketing, attendee check-in, networking, and much more.
Exhibitor – FairPlatz Design

FairPlatz is a project managing and technical services company with a global presence. It offers B2B solutions for event organisers, creative agencies, and stand builders.
Exhibitor – Foscart

Foscart is an event management company that also specialises in providing creative entertainment and production house solutions to its diverse clientele across multiple industries.
Exhibitor – Four Corner

Four Corner delivers fully-integrated event management and marketing solutions tailored to the requirement of every client.
Exhibitor – Gallow Glass

GallowGlass helps companies host successful events while complying with Health and Safety legislation in the region. The company offers up-to-date advice and expertise on making the event absolutely safe for everyone.
Exhibitor – GES

GES is a trade show execution company boasting a vast experience spanning over 90 years in planning, designing, and production.
Exhibitor – GT Exhibition ME

GT Exhibition offers exhibition logistics and association transport services for specialist projects along with domestic and international events in the UK and UAE.
Exhibitor – iBooth ME

iBooth ME is a photo and video booth rental company that offers creative solutions for virtual, hybrid, and in-person events. It creates customised experiences through its impeccable services.
Exhibitor – Inspire

Inspire is a Dubai-based event, activations, and production agency. It specialises in serving medium and large-scale events through state-of-the-art production and technology services.
Exhibitor – JAM

JAM offers a consultancy firm offering safety and people solutions for the event industry in the Middle East region. The company works with industry leaders to create safe experiences for everyone.
Exhibitor – Jasani

Jasani is the largest gift supplier in the Middle East region. The company has deep expertise and experience in corporate giveaways, promotional gifts, and branded merchandise.
Exhibitor – Jinou Trading

Jinou Trading LLC has emerged as a reputable name for bespoke corporate gifts and promotional items. With its services available in GCC, the company offers abundant options to choose customised gifts.
Exhibitor – KraftWerk

Kraft Werk is a design agency in Dubai that creates highly engaging futuristic experiences and brand activations by leveraging creative technology.
Exhibitor – Maestra

Started off as an AV rental business, Maestra has now become a multi-disciplined supplier, facilitating the Event & Exhibition Industry in the region. The company specialises in CNC machinery, paint finishing, metalwork, carpentry and joinery, and AV solutions.
Exhibitor – Magna Innovations

Magna Innovations offers end-to-end mechatronic solutions that improve people-to-product engagement. The company uses futuristic technologies to fulfil modern advertising and marketing needs.
Exhibitor – Magic Trading Co.

With over three decades of vast experience, Magic Trading Co is recognized as one of the pioneers in the promotional gifts industry in the Middle East due to its innovative printing and branding technologies.
Exhibitor – Media Pro International

Media Pro is a Dubai-based event production company serving the industry for more than 10 years by executing over 500 outstanding events.
Exhibitor – Motus

MOTUS is a transport management solution provider. The company has a proven track record of designing and delivering transport solutions for events and exhibitions.
Exhibitor – Novelty

The sister company of Novelty France, Novelty Middle East extends its services as an AV technical partner in the event industry.
Exhibitor – No 1 events

A reputable event organisation company in the UAE, No 1 Events excels in producing high-quality events in the region, regardless of their scale and type.
Exhibitor – Nu’ Art

Nu’ Art is a show production and design agency servicing corporate events, weddings, resort and beach clubs, and private parties.
Exhibitor – Precise Group

Precise Group has carved a strong reputation in multiple disciplines, including 3D products, sub-surface laser etching of crystals, corporate gifts, merchandise, and general trading.
Exhibitor – Purple Glo

Based in Dubai, Purple Glo offers event technology services and a broad range of experiential marketing products. The company excels in VR, motion games, and AR solutions.
Exhibitor – Rayqube

Rayqube is a future-tech software agency based in Dubai with a focus on creating impeccable solutions. The company’s services include brand activation, ticketing and registration, metaverse, virtual and hybrid events, etc.
Exhibitor – Rent it

Rent It is an event IT company that facilitates online and virtual events through its range of services, including technology design, software development, WiFI network construction, etc.
Exhibitor – Sajlini

Sajlini is a cutting-edge event management platform that facilitates organisers through a range of services and solutions.
Exhibitor – Simple Solutions

Simple Solutions is an events and exhibition fit-out company known to offer exceptional services by delivering out-of-the-box solutions for every occasion and event.
Exhibitor – Silver Pixelz

Silver Pixels offers impeccable market solutions for events and exhibitions with its presence in multiple countries, including the UAE and India.
Exhibitor – SLS Production

SLS Production specialises in audio, visual, and multimedia productions for events. The company has been at the forefront of creating flawless event experiences through its innovative solutions.
Exhibitor – Solas

Solas offers creative event and communication solutions in the GCC region using state-of-the-art technology. The company extends its services for gala dinners, conferences, corporate vents, exhibition and award shows, and private parties.
Exhibitor – Table Art

An event planning company in Dubai, Table Art designs unique and remarkable centrepieces for every type of event. The company has an eco-friendly workshop where all its products are designed and created.
Exhibitor – THA

THA serves as a staffing partner for luxury retail establishments, hospitality outlets, and the event sector globally. It offers temporary and permanent staffing solutions to companies across different industries.
Exhibitor – vFairs

vFair is a complete event management platform that helps organisations host engaging in-person, virtual, and hybrid events successfully.
